source: Wings for Life World Run 2014 Comporta, Portugal
title: News Cut
description: Committed in passing the message of Wings for Life Run World, some of the Portuguese ambassadors of the race flocked together at the National Stadium to live a different day. The Dakar veteran Hélder Rodrigues, the bodyboarder Hugo Pinheiro, BASE Jumper Mário Pardo, the athlete Naide Gomes, activist Salvador Mendes de Almeida and rugby legend Tomaz Morais thus shared their enthusiasm and goals for may 4.

source: Wings for Life World Run 2014 Hualian, Taiwan
title: Selects - Ambassador Gin Oy
description:
interview questions:
1. What do you think of Wings for Life in general? (making spinal cord injury curable)
2. How do you like the idea of the world run?
3. What do you like most? (globality, simultaneous runs, race format, charity idea, …)
4. What does being an ambassador mean to you?
5. Will you participate yourself?
6. If yes – what is the goal you set for yourself?

source: Red Bull Flugtag 2011 Moscow, Russia
title: News Cut
description: More than 100 000 people gathered on the bank of Mosva-river on August 7th to watch 39 extravagant teams, performing on 6 meter ramp before the flight on their self-made flying machines. It is one of the biggest events ever happened in Moscow. The longest flight was 19 meters from the team ‘Illusion of the Flight’. The most spectacular flight was from Rostov Rak Team, they won the 1st place.

title: News Cut
description: All you need in one go: garage life, car on track, our drivers having fun as well as interviews with our Team Principal Franz Tost, Technical Director James Key and our drivers Carlos Sainz and Daniil Kvyat, of course!

source: Reggie Bush 2012 Salzburg, Austria
title: News Cut
description: Reggie Bush, NFL Star and American Football running back for the Miami Dolphins, came to Austria for a short Visit. After a Flight with aerobatics pilot Hannes Arch, he had a boat cruise at the Mondsee and visited the local Football Team in Salzburg. Bush will now return to the United States and join up with his Miami Dolphins teammates to prepare for the upcoming NFL Season.

source: Red Bull Air Race World Championship 2018 Stop 4 - Budapest, Hungary
title: News Cut
description: Massive crowds of Czech fans among 135,000 spectators in Budapest for the fourth round of the Red Bull Air Race 2018 this weekend were ecstatic as Martin Šonka took his first win of the season. France had much to celebrate as well, when young Frenchman Mika Brageot earned his career-first race podium in second, and in third place, Matt Hall of Australia tightened his grip on the top of the World Championship standings.

source: Red Bull Racing Show Run 2014 As Salimiyah, Kuwait
title: News Cut
description:
Carlos Sainz Jr. and Infiniti Red Bull Racing storm the streets of Kuwait

20,000 racing fans lined the streets next to the Kuwait Towers to watch Red Bull Junior Driver Carlos Sainz Jr. perform a repertoire of donuts, burnouts and speed stretches. Fans experienced the thrill of the Infiniti Red Bull Racing Formula One car as they got close to the action with lots of burnouts and donuts.
